#summary Documentation about the TwitterGatherer Application

<h1>Twitter Gatherer</h1>

The !AusStage Twitter Gatherer is a Java based application used to gather messages from [http://twitter.com Twitter] uses the [http://dev.twitter.com/pages/streaming_api Twitter Streaming API].

The application is currently undergoing development and more information will be added here as development progresses.


== Libraries Used in Development ==
 * [http://github.com/seejohnrun/tweetStream4J tweetStream4J]
   * Information [http://techxplorer.com/2010/08/02/exploring-tweetstream4j/ on compiling] the tweetStream4J package
